pageContext.claim: “I’m very concerned that Russia will be fighting very hard to have an impact on the upcoming Election. Based on the fact that no President has been tougher on Russia than me, they will be pushing very hard for the Democrats. They definitely don’t want Trump!”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence that Russia favors Democrats, either in the 2016 election or in the upcoming elections. U.S. intelligence concluded that Russia worked to help get Trump elected. Moreover, Trump has not been tougher on Russia. Sanctions have been imposed by Congress, despite Trump's efforts to weaken them.
